Bingo!

## /bingo make_team

**Usage**

- `/bingo make_team bingo:<string> [second_user:<user>] [third_user:<user>] [fourth_user:<user>] [fifth_user:<user>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `bingo` | `string` | Yes | The bingo. | - |
| `second_user` | `user` | No | The second user. | - |
| `third_user` | `user` | No | The third user. | - |
| `fourth_user` | `user` | No | The fourth user. | - |
| `fifth_user` | `user` | No | The fifth user. | - |

## /bingo create_bingo

**Usage**

- `/bingo create_bingo title:<string> duration_days:<integer> start_date_unix_seconds:<integer> ticket_price:<integer> team_size:<integer> notifications_channel_id:<string> organizers:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `title` | `string` | Yes | The title of the bingo. | - |
| `duration_days` | `integer` | Yes | The duration of the bingo in days. | - |
| `start_date_unix_seconds` | `integer` | Yes | The start date in unix seconds. | - |
| `ticket_price` | `integer` | Yes | The ticket price. | - |
| `team_size` | `integer` | Yes | The team size. | - |
| `notifications_channel_id` | `string` | Yes | The channel to send notifications to. | - |
| `organizers` | `string` | Yes | The organizers (user IDs separated by comma). | - |

## /bingo manage_bingo

**Usage**

- `/bingo manage_bingo bingo:<string> [add_tile:<string>] [csv_dump:<boolean>] [remove_tile:<string>] [finalize:<boolean>] [add_extra_gp:<integer>] [trophy_handout:<boolean>]`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `bingo` | `string` | Yes | The bingo. | - |
| `add_tile` | `string` | No | Add a tile to your bingo. | - |
| `csv_dump` | `boolean` | No | Dump a csv file with all the bingo results. | - |
| `remove_tile` | `string` | No | Remove a tile from your bingo. | - |
| `finalize` | `boolean` | No | Finalize/end the bingo. | - |
| `add_extra_gp` | `integer` | No | Add extra gp to the prize. | - |
| `trophy_handout` | `boolean` | No | Hand out trophies. | - |
